text: The women's 4x100 metres relay event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 2 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Angela Williams Keyon Soley Myra Combs Shakedia Jones ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Céline Thélamon Muriel Hurtis Nadia Imalouan Anne Carole Rapp ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Tulia Robinson Aleen Bailey Melaine Walker Lisa Sharpe ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 2 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
